title: Heads 'n' tails
creator_credit: Jane Oehr, Kay Francis and New South Wales. Dept. of Health
brief_description: A program that depicts the interaction between a group of teenagers coping with the pressures of growing up in an urban environment. An educational and entertaining video with a sequel called, “On The Loose”. Stars Steve Bergen, Jim Filipovski and Jane Stevens. Music by Todd Hunter. Rated: PG
creator_credit_for_label: Jane Oehr, Kay Francis and New South Wales. Dept. of Health
